item.title: [317] Ancient Warrior armour sets! [Statius, Vesta, Zuriel, Morrigan]
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

dabombkiler2:

Now i know thats not it but… ty but i still need to know were to put

You put them in (client side) class8.java under “Class8 method198”.

EDIT:
I noticed that this did not include any dropped models.
I took my time to find them and decided that I might as well upload them and share them with you guys.
Download Link: http://tiny.cc/8j4cq
Note: You have to run them thought RSDatmaker
Piledbynoobs, feel free to add this link to your main thread if you’d like.

Read full topic
